title.narrative: STRENGTHEN QUALITY NUTRITION SERVICES

description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Early Detection And Treatment Of Malnutrition, Nutrition In Early Childhood, Nutrition Of Adolescents And Women. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Risk-Informed Humanitarian And Development Nexus Programming, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

sector.narrative: Breastfeeding protection, promotion and support, including work on the Code of Marketing of Breastmilk Substitutes
Diet diversity in early childhood, including complementary feeding, multiple micronutrient powders and lipid-based nutrition supplements
Early detection and treatment for children with life-threatening wasting
Maternal nutrition, including counselling, micronutrient supplementation and dietary support
Micronutrient supplementation in early childhood, including vitamin A supplementation and deworming prophylaxis
Preparedness and response for maternal and child nutrition
Prevention of undernutrition and micronutrient deficiencies in middle childhood and adolescence
Salt iodization and other large-scale food fortification
Technical assistance - Nutrition in early childhood
UN Joint Programmes, Pooled Funds and UN to UN agreements
